title: (x) Faces on sales receipts - various {gang}
content:
I'm hopeing some of you on typophile would be able to help me with this:   
   
I need to find fonts that resemble fonts on your sale receipts (other than courier, letter gothic..) and a newspaper typeface (like the Mercury font designed by Hoefler Type Foundry.)   
   
Sorry I don't have any scans to show at this moment..
author: anonymous

comments.content: the [Telidon Ink](http://web.archive.org/web/20110902121103/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/telidon-ink/) family might be what you're looking for to resemble the sales receipts

There's some free fonts in that style: [Cape-Arcona](http://web.archive.org/web/20110902121103/http:/www.cape-arcona.com/)'s   
 [Address Unknown](http://web.archive.org/web/20110902121103/http:/www.cape-arcona.com/sites/fonts/font_address.html) might do. David M. Cushman's   
 [Receipt](http://web.archive.org/web/20110902121103/http:/www.formsubstance.com/dirt/) from Dirtfonts seems currently unavailable.

If you want a rough, quick-printed dot-matrix or inkjet look for the receipt font, you could look into something like the [Spikee](http://web.archive.org/web/20110902121103/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?Image=TPT0000075), [Tickee](http://web.archive.org/web/20110902121103/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?Image=TPT0000076) or [Yeti](http://web.archive.org/web/20110902121103/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?Image=TPT0000063) families from Test Pilot Collective.
